author: Arap Teriki
text: Kenyans creating memes, making fun of even the most difficult of our motherland's problems isn't to show disrespect or show that they're less serious: it's simply because we strive to perceive our problems with positivity as we find lasting solutions. This; our health's sake.

author: Arap Teriki
text: The anticipations of today are the things you did nothing about yesterday
